name: Ext_R5_ResearchStudy_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ResearchStudy.status for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchStudy.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchStudy|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The publication state of the resource (not of the study).
element.comment: `ResearchStudy.status` maps to R4B `ResearchStudy.status`. The value set relationship of RelatedTo is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as RelatedTo.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

element.definition: The publication state of the resource (not of the study).
element.comment: `ResearchStudy.status` maps to R4B `ResearchStudy.status`. The value set relationship of RelatedTo is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as RelatedTo.

binding.description: Codes that convey the current publication status of the research study resource.
